DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research examine association price change , nutrient profiling , grocery food purchase among household grocery shopper .
DOC.brief_title: Price Changes Nutrient Profiling Among Adult Grocery Shoppers
DOC.detailed_description: Participants ask select week 's worth grocery household virtual online grocery store . Shoppers randomly assign one four condition ( control , nutrient profiling , price change , nutrient profiling price change ) .
